WorkItem.Description:
Mag'hari Chieftain's Staff item level 251 versus Abracadaver also item level 251
Purified Dreadstones in the Mag'hari and the Abracadaver has +23 spell power and the purified dreadstone
The issue is rawr states the the Mag'Hari does more dps. I dont see how this is ever possible as the only stat that is improved is mana regen.
 
Health is -120
Mana -465.7
Mana Regen +50
Spell damage is -8.7
Spell hit is -3.85%
spell crit is -.19%
spell haste is -.18%
Speed is 3.10 where the other is 2.x 
 
how can this weapon be superior in dps to the abra?
 
Thanks,
WorkItem.Summary: Staff Weapon Data seems off - Mag'hari verus Abracadaver

Comments.Message: Not a bug. See the 'I Don't Understand Why...' help page.
